CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT and CHI stand in room with toys on floor
INV leaves room and shuts door
MOT kneels on floor behind CHI
CHI picks up toy car from rug
MOT takes CHIs arm out of coat
CHI drops car she was holding
MOT removes CHIs coat all the way
CHI points to picture on wall
MOT looks where CHI is pointing
CHI continues to point and look at picture
MOT looks where CHI is pointing
MOT moves towards chair carrying coat
MOT fiddles with stuff on chair
MOT continues to do something with stuff on chair
MOT turns towards CHI with a diaper in her hand
CHI looks at toys on floor
CHI takes a step toward jack+in+the+box looking at it
MOT takes hold of CHIs arm
MOT picks up CHI and lays her on table
MOT sets CHI on floor and pats her bottom then stands back
CHI walks over to toys and bends over and grabs rubber duck
<bef> CHI picks up duck then kneels looking at it
MOTs upper body is off screen
MOT is standing over her purse by the chair
CHI holds duck looking at it
MOT kneels behind CHI and combs her hair
MOT continues to comb CHIs hair
CHI hits top of jack+in+the+box with hand
MOT continues to comb CHIs hair
CHI hits top of jack+in+the+box again and again then stops

CHI takes hold of jack+in+the+box handle
MOT moves around CHI and combs hair

<aft> MOT shuffles through stuff in chair

CHI is still blocking view from camera

MOT continues to make turning motion

CHI points and looks at second picture
MOT looks where CHI is pointing
MOT points to other picture then looks at CHI
CHI looks at picture MOT points at
MOT looks at CHI and nods head towards her
MOT picks up book and sets it on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at what MOT does
CHI looks where MOT is pointing
CHI looks where MOT is pointing then looks at MOT
MOT gets excited expression and leans towards CHI
MOT points to another picture in book
CHI leans and looks at book more
CHI gets up and walks towards chair
MOT picks up book and looks at pages
CHI takes hold of chair and leans against it
MOT looks at pictures in book
MOT flips pages in the book
MOT flips through pages and continues to look at picture
MOT continues to look at pages of book
CHI leans against chair then walks back to first chair
MOT looks at the book then at CHI
CHI holds on to chair and looks under table
INV explains Small Scale Activity then leaves room at 10:55:18 . INV enters room at 11:01:07
INV puts object on table and sets it in motion
MOT brushes CHIs hairs away from face
CHI glances at table then looks back at object
MOT leans close to CHI and looks t her
MOT pushes CHIs hands away from object
MOT lets go of CHI and sits back and watches her
MOT pushes CHIs hand away from object then lets go of CHI
MOT tries to pull CHIs hand away from object

MOT restrains CHIs arms with her hands
MOT pulls CHI onto chair more

CHI puts hand on other toy on table
CHI points to base of object
INV leaves room and shuts door

CHI stands still with blanket on her head

someone sneezed outside of the room
